  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.LongPollingBot, org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.generics.TelegramBot
    public class UpnotifyBot
extends org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.TelegramLongPollingBot
    The long polling bot that takes updates implicitly from the (http) telegram bot api.

        public void onUpdateReceived​(org.telegram.telegrambots.meta.api.objects.Update update)
        This method gets called whenever an update is received. Then the mpu unit will be used to submit the updates to respective threads within the pool.
